name: Uncle Acid and the Deadbeats
description: '''Uncle Acid & the Deadbeats''' (written as '''Uncle Acid and the deadbeats''' or simply '''Uncle Acid''') are an English [[psychedelic rock]] and [[doom metal]] band formed in [[Cambridge]] by Kevin Starrs in 2009. The band has released six studio albums and one live album. Their most recent studio album ''Nell' Ora Blu'', was released in May 2024 â€“ as well as a number of singles. The band appears regularly at festivals around Europe.
